Epsom Girls Grammar School responds to revelations former music teacher Peter Thomas had sex with student https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/epsom-girls-grammar-school-responds-to-revelations-former-music-peter-thomas-had-sex-with-student/ZR6DAOT5DFED3NXW4VD2NNUB6Q/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/epsom-girls-grammar-school-responds-to-revelations-former-music-peter-thomas-had-sex-with-student/ZR6DAOT5DFED3NXW4VD2NNUB6Q/ Lane NicholsThe Epsom college has criticised the Teaching Council in an email to parents today. Mon, 23 Sep 2024 01:33:32 +0000 Peter Thomas, a former conductor of the Auckland Symphony Orchestra, has been found guilty of serious misconduct by the Teachers’ Disciplinary Tribunal after having sex with a student at Epsom Girls Grammar School.
